findings.title: PTRP - Potential Transfer Revert Propagation
findings.description: The contract sends funds to a `marketingWallet` as part of the transfer flow, which may revert from incoming payment.

findings.title: IDI - Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: Variables are not defined as immutable.

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: State variables can be declared as constant using the `constant` keyword.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The contract does not follow the Solidity style guide for naming conventions.
findings.location: SheikhShiba contract, function and variable names

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Events are not properly designed and implemented in the contract.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: Variables are missing proper checks for zero values.

findings.title: L19 - Stable Compiler Version
findings.description: The pragma version is not locked, which may lead to compatibility issues.

findings.title: L20 - Succeeded Transfer Check
findings.description: According to the ERC20 specification, transfer methods should be checked if the result is successful.
